Html: I have noted a few people talk about Rotations. I am new so forgive me if i seem stupid, but is it possible to change or to make a custom rotation, or is it possible to view the rotation that is used to get the dps. ( That's even if it used a rotation at all :P) If it is possible to view or change the rotation how would one go about doing this.

That is wholly specific to each and every model. Some allow you to set Spell Priority Queues (Mage, Warlock, etc.), others allow you to turn abilities on/off but it will control the rotation in which those abilities are used (DPSWarr) and many don't give you any control at all.
